Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4304 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.72.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4304 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.72.0-2. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than 1.72.0-2, affected by CVE-2022-4304
